It's very fun with plenty of cool tricks and tips that I still find myself discovering after so much time in game. I can definitely recommend to those who have interest in this product. however I must warn all newcomers to be aware that while there are definitely some rotten players that love to troll and be toxic (both in game and in chat), that the majority of players are people that just want to have a good time and will be more than willing to help you out or even party up with you after the match. I do think that survive with friends should change how players earn rank due to how different of an experience it is when you have coms with your fellow survivors. This can frankly be unfair to killers, especially in the fact that killer players see no indication of whether survivors are playing together or solo queing.  With those minor gripes aside I hands down recommend this game to anyone with interest.
muito bom, gostei bastante, te entretem bastante a hora passa mt rapido jogando!

Нереальный дизбаланс в игре просто убивает всякое желание в неё играть, играл всего 5 часов, а уже хочу удалить эту игру. Играл за мана первый раз, сразу сурвы 5-9 рангов, они просто тролят, а поймать их не могу, к тому же в конце, в чате поливают дерьмом. Такая же хрень и при игре за сурва. Если играть, то только фулл пати.

I like to come back and update this review regularly as i hate DBD/Behavior for their poor optimization in this game. Where to begin...

The balancing in this game is next to none when it comes down to it. You have blow hard survivors and killers so it doesn't matter which side you're for they're both going to cry. The fact that killers can hit you through windows and other random object is indeed the dumbest thing ever. DBD has supposedly implemented a "Hit detection" into the server to verify if that should have been true or not. *Slaps knee* Let me tell you hot much that is working! The gif of the monkeys using laptops and smashing the keys in is how i picture EXACTLY what the dev team is over there doing when adding in patches and updates. 

Also, why is this game takes a decade to update every single time they add in an update that's even a few MB's big? Insane. Now Behavior on the other hand.. Those apes that have control over banning accounts and providing poor customer support.. Don't even get me started on how amazing they are and the bang up job they're doing. The big brains over there within the industry that thought putting in an "Auto Ban" feature was a GOOD idea has to be the best idea ever heard of right? Not only did i lose my account awhile back like complete access as my steam was compromised I came back to a ban here. When asking for any information on it and to even look at my track record they basically straight up said "Nah. All bans are final." Yeah, okay this is why i won't support DBD even with spare accounts as i get the cd keys online from... sites... so i don't have to give them any money. 

You  want a game that is just as bad as League or WORSE than this would be the game to invest into. I'll come back when i want to rage some more on these goons.

Dość ciekawa propozycja ale tylko na ,, weekendowe " granie w gronie przyjaciół. 

+Spora ilość postaci , dość dobrze zbilansowany system gier .
+Dobra gra dla zabicia nudy ( * na większą ilość godzin się nie nadaje )
+Nawet dobre community graczy , brak dzieci 

-Brak możliwości rozmowy głosowej podczas gry co zabiera urok tej gierce.
-Szybko się nudzi , max 4-5 gierek na jeden weekend w zupełności wystarczy
-Duża ilość bugów zabijających magię tej gry 

6,5/10

After over 800 hours played I can confidently say that this game is objectively bad.

Some killers you have to pay for are arguably a lot better than the free killers. 

The whole game revolves you running around, sometimes getting camped and getting salty at the game. The game is fun with 4 friends for a bit but it gets old real fast.

Ich hab den Fehler gemacht Dead by Daylight Ende Oktober letzten Jahres extrem zu suchten. Ich hab so viele Spielstunden aufgebaut, es hat extrem Spaß gemacht. Es war wirklich DIE Freizeitbeschäftigung. Doch dann kam das neue Update wo man sämtliche Dinge mal wieder so angepasst hat, dass die Killer Glücklich sind. Es ist jetzt als Killer verdammt einfach zu gewinnen. 

Generell scheint es so das in den ganzen Monaten seit dem ich Spiele die Killer Anfangen kein Bock mehr zu haben und meistens eher Campen oder Tunneln. Macht so kein Spaß mehr
